title: Tvvo bookes of epigrammes, and epitaphs Dedicated to two top-branches of gentry: Sir Charles Shirley, Baronet, and William Davenport, Esquire. Written by Thomas Bancroft.
author: Bancroft, Thomas, fl. 1633-1658.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Matthew Walbancke, and are to be sold at his shop in Grayes-Inne-gate,
